nodes.text: The Corellian Run Scoundrels was a smuggling gang operating on the Corellian Run during the Galactic War. A notorious Corellian Run Scoundrels captain Kai Zykken operated from Raider's Cove on Rishi, along with his first mate Tomota.
Corellian Run Scoundrels first appeared in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
